articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Exclusive - AirAsia targets US$300mil raise via US listing of digital business - The Star Online
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (Reuters) - Malaysia's low-cost airline AirAsia Group Bhd is considering a listing of its digital arm via a special-purpose acquisition company (SPAC) in the United States to raise at least US$300 million, its chief said on Wednesday.
